TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed MultiplayerQualityOfServiceMeasurements extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents matchmaking quality of service (QoS) measurements for the network used by a session member.

MemberSignature.Value: public MultiplayerQualityOfServiceMeasurements (string memberDeviceToken, Windows.Foundation.TimeSpan latency, ulong bandwidthDownInKilobitsPerSecond, ulong bandwidthUpInKilobitsPerSecond, string customJson);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string memberDeviceToken, valuetype Windows.Foundation.TimeSpan latency, unsigned int64 bandwidthDownInKilobitsPerSecond, unsigned int64 bandwidthUpInKilobitsPerSecond, string customJson) runtime managed

Docs.param: The device token of the session member that this measurement is for.
The measured latency, in milliseconds, for the session member.
The minimum bandwidth down, in kilobits per second, for downloading data from the host to the session member.
The minimum bandwidth up, in kilobits per second, for uploading data from the session member to the host.
A JSON string that specifies the custom QoS properties.
Docs.summary: Creates a new MultiplayerQualityOfServiceMeasurements object for a session member.
